# Trajectories

This section develop trajectories per attributes.

```{r fit_all}
#| eval: false
ogf <- cmdstan_model("models/ogf.stan")
stp <- cmdstan_model("models/stp.stan")
vars <- c(
  "ba", "agb", "nstem", "gini",
  "diversity_q1_gen", "FDiv",
  "WD_cwm_ba", "SLA_cwm_ba"
)
vars <- "agb"
lapply(vars, sample_ogf)
lapply(vars, sample_stp)
```
